alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 7:47PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Ashley County through 830 PM CST... At 747 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Milo, or 7 miles northwest of North Crossett, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Old Milo around 755 PM CST. Hamburg and Fountain Hill around 800 PM CST. Snyder around 815 PM CST. Portland around 820 PM CST. Montrose around 825 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Blanchton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
